question.direction-text: Select the appropriate sentences from the answer choices that are key points in a discussion of how well various publishers succeeded in creating adless newspapers. This question is worth 3 points.

intro-text.b: This passage discusses Ben and Jerry's unconventional company.

answer.answer-text: Some seeds are able to float great distances in the air.
Some plant life existed before islands were cut off from larger bodies of land.
Some islands have many different varieties of plants.
Birds sometimes carry seeds to islands.
Some islands were created when rising water cut them off from larger bodies of land.
Some plant seeds are carried to islands by the wind.
